title.narrative: Voluntary medical project to combat blindness and the diseases that cause it.

description.narrative: 1- Health education and raising awareness of eye protection and protection from various diseases and their complications. 2- Alleviating and eliminating the suffering of families who are unable to provide for the costs of operations. 3- Activating the role of volunteers and building their capacities to volunteer in the fields of humanitarian work.
Number of patients benefited: 465 Number of operations: 400 Number of glasses: 400

This campaign comes as part of a series of voluntary medical campaigns at the King Salman Center for Relief and Humanitarian Action towards afflicted communities around the world, and the importance of this influential role in alleviating human suffering to lead a dignified life.
